ThingDef.label: PCA ARM-CR
ThingDef.description: An artifical weaponized arm built by an archotech. It's strong enough to crush a thick hardwood branch in its hand, and precise enough to write a sonnet on a grain of rice. It looks and feels like natural flesh, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. It also have mounted charge rifle weapon but only has half stats over normal charge rifle weapon. Requires archotech weapons research to install it.
